overview: Before the 2002 hit Blue Crush drew mainstream attention to the world of women's surfing, this documentary captured many of the film's stars -- including Sanoe Lake, who played Lena -- in action on the waves. Other surfers include Rochelle Ballard, Megan Abubo, Kate Skarratt and Keala Kennelly. The film features spectacular photography and a cool soundtrack with the Crystal Method, Dance Hall Crashers, Morcheeba and others.
title: Blue Crush: The Original
